articles.description: New COVID-19 infections have been going up in Florida so getting vaccine is recommended by CDC.
articles.content:
Increasing COVID-19 infections may prompt the thought: Should I get a booster shot?
The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says Americans need to stay current on their vaccines against … [+4879 chars]
